entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
